data.title: Picture Perfect Sound®
data.meta_description: Leon Speakers is an American manufacturer of custom audio and audiovisual solutions that mix art with audio and design with technology.
data.text:
We’ve created custom speakers for luxury residences throughout the world. See some of our most beautiful product installation photography below.

RESIDENTIAL PROJECTS

From Fortune 500 companies to higher-education, hospitality, and more, we bring sound and style to businesses throughout the world.

COMMERCIAL PROJECTS

As a completely custom shop, we can materialize the vision of any design, from inspiration to fabrication.

CUSTOM SHOP

Behind every custom project is a lot of planning—from design and engineering through construction and final install. See how the process comes together.

CASE STUDIES

Looking to integrate Leon into your next project? Get access to product cut sheets and DWG files.

EXPLORE

Our story is rooted in American manufacturing and design. See what inspires us and learn more about our team – from our collection of fine art to a historical retrospective of the products that define our industry.

OUR STORY | OUR TEAM

Our reputation in the industry for high quality, design-driven speakers and technology concealment solutions has become a perfect platform for artist collaborations. We have partnered with revered artists to deliver something truly unique for our customers.

MIKE HAN | CHRIS SAUNDERS

Our mission has always been to bring the music to more people and more spaces, and the Leon Loft—our dedicated performance space right upstairs from our shop—is the ultimate expression of that mission.

YOUTUBE PLAYLIST

Contact a Customer Service Rep for more information about any of our products or assistance with an order.

GET IN TOUCH
